vecHighlight.strDescription: 在“城堡”关卡中鸣响城堡大钟
把“工厂”里的4台收音机全都抛离关卡
在不打开一盏灯的情况下，完成“工厂”的前一半
在“工厂”中，把最后一个房间里的每种物品各扔一件到火里
只使用高尔夫球杆，在3杆之内击球入洞
以头先落水的姿势完成“水”
开着高尔夫球车到关卡的边缘

vecUnachieved.strDescription: 在“高塔”中，找到一条移动电池的更短路线
在“红岩”上，用下水道逃出垃圾场
在“巨人国”中到达电钻上方的最高层平台
去除“巨人国”中的所有灰烬
打开“红岩”中的自动点唱机
在“红岩”中，把帽子放在仙人掌上
使用管道穿过“高塔”的熔岩

vecAchievedHidden.strDescription: 在“蒸汽”场景中打破梯子
在“冰”关卡完成1次完整的滑雪椅巡回

蒸汽”场景中打破梯子","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/19727978d6b02c26ea9e8bee9677a438f8d2fa01.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":15.600000381469727,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement1011",{"strName":"雪崩","strDescription":"完成“冰”关卡","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/b13e2bbf196345c7923651c97ad445d65b233294.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":13.699999809265137}],["Achievement003",{"strName":"这该怎么上？","strDescription":"完成“山峰”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/666538e0b81ddfa87b7a0aff7b3ecf43afe6a485.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":62.099998474121094}],["Achievement004",{"strName":"强拆","strDescription":"完成“拆除”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/c372d5468856b6ea830e886de68247cd3d6b8eb5.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":53.599998474121094}],["Achievement005",{"strName":"撞开城门！","strDescription":"完成“城堡”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/0951829565b4129746b0ceee20f3a3f20d33ccd4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":42.400001525878906}],["Achievement006",{"strName":"脚朝下","strDescription":"以脚先落水的姿势完成“水”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/09ac323d713ae6c85ac82150b5b3b0ac6e74cd0d.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":32}],["Achievement007",{"strName":"头朝下","strDescription":"以头先落水的姿势完成“水”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/5b72990149cc53e20f7f69cb1af027ab9a5f0ccb.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.9000000953674316}],["Achievement008",{"strName":"通关了？","strDescription":"完成“发电厂”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/2e6709365917cd09b327a98c6a9707de3935f07c.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":31.399999618530273}],["Achievement009",{"strName":"全速前进 ","strDescription":"从头至尾一次通关","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/43dc138f818fce0bbc98e1957029f83c78294a4b.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.0999999046325684}],["Achievement011",{"strName":"鸽子模拟器","strDescription":"站在序章雕像的头顶","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/fd86c1a9e2487ab8b07a6e2df33e8d8b6aeac1c6.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5}],["Achievement012",{"strName":"小心有坑！","strDescription":"在“豪宅”关卡中抄一个超方便的近路","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/531c3214dcd6dce107b4a410fb20f6b3c678311f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.399999618530273}],["Achievement013",{"strName":"热心公益","strDescription":"把 块碎片放进垃圾桶","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/c2a1ab1c9240e3448ad01ee4809ce77189e456bf.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.5999999046325684}],["Achievement014",{"strName":"完美主义者","strDescription":"把翻转的长椅和墙靠齐","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/2e5b595c457b457f8bd8b4095d0a3ddb41a5df09.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.700000047683716}],["Achievement015",{"strName":"卡住了","strDescription":"在“搬运”关卡中卡住一扇门然后通过","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/22000f86fb4bdf87f2068fcd799942df91a2cb79.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":16.5}],["Achievement016",{"strName":"高塔 ","strDescription":"在“搬运”关卡中把全部四个箱子堆在一起","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/5781717188685084c75e12ad948e74a51dcb93ed.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.0999999046325684}],["Achievement017",{"strName":"人猿泰山！","strDescription":"在“山峰”关卡中用绳索飞到深渊上空","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/2c5e178a6477d3e796e960ba47469bedcd5b0df3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":22.100000381469727}],["Achievement018",{"strName":"安静时间（吵闹的邻居）","strDescription":"在“山峰”关卡中破坏音响","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/832b10fa0d382288fced1301698eccaed050a9f7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":11.300000190734863}],["Achievement019",{"strName":"我的宝贝","strDescription":"在“山峰”关卡中把所有宝石堆成一堆","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/e3b2dd3ea1a23b5ef3c5635a1741e3a4db407007.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.5}],["Achievement020",{"strName":"走错路","strDescription":"在“拆除”关卡中使用左边的窗户而非砸穿墙壁","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/dc264f45d561b2c2e2c8e8130b3a53f678ef6ea2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":20.200000762939453}],["Achievement021",{"strName":"惊喜！（雪崩！）","strDescription":"在“拆除”关卡中打开鹅卵石大门","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/f0b0fcd1f809669c5031f2a84107e8b1970eb641.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":54.5}],["Achievement022",{"strName":"原始人 ","strDescription":"在“拆除”关卡中不用任何工具打碎四堵墙","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/74e6a7f5bd801e223f68c058aae1bec103cb56ff.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":9.399999618530273}],["Achievement024",{"strName":"丧钟为谁而鸣","strDescription":"在“城堡”关卡中鸣响城堡大钟","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/f795a247b93b22e0d392b65db100cc2ade789cd5.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.5}],["Achievement025",{"strName":"滑索","strDescription":"在“城堡”关卡中从教堂塔楼滑下","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/0d0b422c810b6d459e7214692cabee31f7ff3360.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.700000047683716}],["Achievement026",{"strName":"凌波微步","strDescription":"在“城堡”关卡中从小巷一路跑酷到铁匠铺，全程不落地","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/1f2db619660a8e40d3c3b97eb1cbceb9bfe37e4a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.600000023841858}],["Achievement027",{"strName":"让我们荡起双桨","strDescription":"在“水”关卡中使用小船到达集装箱船","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/9c8e87cfd8b72effbaeb967d1265907a398a27e3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":12.800000190734863}],["Achievement028",{"strName":"倒档","strDescription":"在“水”关卡中开倒档让船进入港口","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/4f847b1f07a587375cfcb198c94fe8791def78f3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.5}],["Achievement029",{"strName":"信标 ","strDescription":"在“水”关卡中点亮灯塔","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/d242336329c9ee04617259cdb6cf9e5a07d93d80.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.699999809265137}],["Achievement030",{"strName":"呼吸练习","strDescription":"在“水”关卡中在 100 毫秒内浮出水面以免溺水","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/ede65412193b0ace68f2fd41b5ed95488e539424.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":31.700000762939453}],["Achievement031",{"strName":"冲浪者 ","strDescription":"在“水”关卡中从山上滑下时不弄湿自己","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/477160/a736af95b7c032d8fe226af11d36907a2fa326b2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":10.600000381469727}]]]]

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copperworld_Steam_StoreHeading_NewLevelAvailableNow_SCH.png?t=1686267666[/img]
[h2][b]***全新关卡“黄铜世界”现已推出***[/b][/h2]

《人类一败涂地》黄铜世界已开启！这一全新关卡灵感来自深受大家钟爱的化学元素，原子序数 29 的铜元素！

欢迎来到满是巨型齿轮、电线和庞大煤炭发电机的工业地带，并在这里解锁令人意想不到的通关路线。在《人类一败涂地》这一最具挑战性的关卡中，探索其中的环境和引人入胜的神秘境地吧！

拉上您的好友，探索欢腾的“黄铜世界”，尽情享受这份欢呼雀跃！     

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copper_World.gif?t=1686267666[/img]

[b]包含23个绝妙的关卡。全球超过4500万玩家。全平台已经售出超过3000万套。[/b]


[h2][b]《人类一败涂地》是一款轻松搞笑的沙雕游戏，游戏的场景发生在飘渺的梦境之中。[/b][/h2]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copper_World_Ice.gif?t=1686267666[/img]

每个梦境关卡会提供一个全新的环境让玩家探索，从豪宅、城堡和阿兹台克到雪山、光怪陆离的夜景和工业区。每关都贯穿有多条路线和完美设置的谜题，确保热衷探索和聪明的玩家能得到奖励。

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copperworld_Steam_StoreHeading_MoreHumansMoreMayhem_SCH.png?t=1686267666[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copper_World_City.gif?t=1686267666[/img]

需要帮忙把巨石装上投石器，或者需要有人来打破那堵墙？最多8名玩家的在线多人模式会改变《人类一败涂地》的游戏方式。

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copperworld_Steam_StoreHeading_BlankCanvas_SCH.png?t=1686267666[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copper_World_Red_Rock.gif?t=1686267666[/img]

你的软趴趴小人由你自己来定制。可以选择建筑工人、大厨、跳伞员、矿工、宇航员或忍者的服装。还可以分别打扮你的脑袋、上半身和下半身，并且用脑洞让一切变得创意十足！

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copperworld_Steam_StoreHeading_Workshop_SCH.png?t=1686267666[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/workshop.gif?t=1686267666[/img]

仅在Steam平台上发布的《人类一败涂地》创意工坊，是一个绝佳的工具，与Unity一起使用，可以让玩家打造自己的《人类一败涂地》内容，并和全世界的玩家分享。对自己打造关卡、大厅或皮肤不感兴趣？你还可以在Steam上直接下载和探索超过5000个别人的创意关卡！

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/HFF_Copperworld_Steam_StoreHeading_VibrantCommunity_SCH.png?t=1686267666[/img]
[b]生机勃勃的玩家社群[/b]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/477160/extras/factory-3.gif?t=1686267666[/img]

主播和UP主们对《人类一败涂地》尤为青睐，就因为其独特搞笑的游戏方式。这些视频的综合播放量已多达6亿！
data.strSnippet: 《人类一败涂地》是一款轻松搞笑的沙雕游戏，游戏的场景发生在飘渺的梦境之中。玩家既可以单机自闭，也可以最多八人联机一起欢畅。游戏支持的创意工坊，还可以让大家免费玩到不计其数的高质量玩家关卡和皮肤。游戏支持中文。
